activities.name: Surf Survivor
activities.description: The surf survivor course encompasses all aspects of the Baywatch beach lifestyle. You’ll be split into two groups, taught real lifeguard skills by our team of qualified beach lifeguards and will battle it out head to head against each other in a series of rescues and challenges.

activities.name: Sea Kayaking Tour
activities.description: You’ll be taught the fundamentals of kayaking at our Activity Centre on Towan beach only 2 minutes walk from Towan headlands awesome gulleys, inlets and sheltered coves.

activities.name: Spray Paint
activities.description: I will make one painting that I really didn't plan to make. So I just took canvas and started with painting and just go with the flow. And I'm so happy how it turned out.
